short_description.en: $1,500 rebate for a ducted air source heat pump. Must meet efficiency specifications.

short_description.en: Up to $1,000 rebate for an air source heat pump. $400 for standard unit and $1,000 for cold climate unit. Must meet efficiency specifications.

short_description.en: Up to $2,200 rebate for a ductless air source heat pump. Range is between $100 and $2,200 depending on heat pump size, efficiency, and current system.
